extendedInfo.description: NO push notificationsNO spyware, NO malwareFree bonus - cracked glass and squashed mosquitoes backgrounds.As one of the 4 elementary things, the circle of nature wouldnât be possible without fire. Fire live wallpaper is made for those that celebrate the fire of life, the passion that burns in all of us, as well in nature- the sun and volcanoes around the globe. Fire up your device, with fire live wallpaper!After the download you don't need internet connection to enjoy the application. This free app is ad supported. Download once and enjoy for ever.Note:Application can not be moved to SD card.Application is a live wallpaper, to access it on your phone, read your phone manual.Application is intended for display in portrait mode, it will work in landscape mode but display may not be optimal.Rotating the device while in preview of live wallpaper may cause application to crash.Application does not require internet access for primary usage, however internet connection may be required to access some functions (for instance link to More free apps and similar).
